title: roasted duck pancakes with preserved lemon martini
description: Crispy duck, a sweet, sticky sauce and soft pancakes all washed down with a preserved lemon martini. Perfect for an informal dinner party with friends.
ingredients: 1 cucumber, cut into 7mm/½in matchsticks, to serve
2 bunches spring onions, white parts only, to serve
24 Chinese pancakes (available from most supermarkets or Asian grocers), to serve
8 preserved lemons, deseeded and roughly chopped, plus 6 slices to garnish
